ModMetaData.name: Tiberium Rim Factions
ModMetaData.author: Telefonmast and Profugo Barbatus
ModMetaData.description:
-----Transmission Begin----- Hello my child. I am Kane. The ambassador, the prophet. The Brotherhood of Nod is need of new children. Children to spread the word, to spread the green gold. You have shown great abilities in your past. Abilities that could prove helpful with our cause. Shall you decline this invitation. Consquences will curse your fate.
I'm awaiting you. -----Transmisson End-----
